cancel.question: Can I cancel anytime?
cancel.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time. You'll retain access to Premium features until the end of your billing period.

change.question: Can I change plans?
change.answer: Yes, you can switch between monthly and annual payments at any time in your subscription settings.

secure.question: Are my payments secure?
secure.answer: Absolutely! We use Stripe for all payments - one of the world's most trusted payment platforms. We never store your card details.
